text: When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield under her owner's control. / +1: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. -2: Put a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token name Ashaya, the Awoken World onto the battlefield. 7: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.

name: Nissa's Pilgrimage
text: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

name: Nissa's Revelation
text: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

name: Orchard Spirit
text: Orchard Spirit can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

name: Outland Colossus
text: Renown 6. Outland Colossus can't be blocked by more than one creature.

name: Pharika's Disciple
text: Deathtouch. Renown 1.

name: Reclaim
text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library

name: Rhox Maulers
text: Trample. Renown 2.

name: Skysnare Spider
text: Vigilance. Reach.

name: Somberwald Alpha
text: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {1}{G}: Target creature you control gains tramples until end of turn.

name: Sylvan Messenger
text: Trample. When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: The Great Aurora
text: Each player shuffles all cards from his or her hand and all permanents he or she owns into this his or her library, then draws that many cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Exile The Great Aurora.

name: Timberpack Wolf
text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.

name: Titanic Growth
text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Undercity Troll
text: Renown 1. {2}{G}: Regenerate Undercity Troll.

name: Valeron Wardens
text: Renown 2. Whenever a creature you control becomes renowned, draw a card.

name: Vine Snare
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 4 or less.

name: Wild Instincts
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls.

name: Woodland Bellower
text: When Woodland Bellower enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a nonlegendary green creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Yeva's Forcemage
text: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Zendikar's Roil
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Blazing Hellhound
text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Blazing Hellhound deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Blood-Cursed Knight
text: As long as you control an enchantment, Blood-Cursed Knight gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

name: Bounding Krasis
text: Flash. When Bounding Krasis enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target creature.

name: Citadel Castellan
text: Vigilance. Renown 2.

name: Iroas's Champion
text: Double strike

name: Possessed Skaab
text: When Possessed Skaab enters the battlefield, return target instant, sorcery, or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If Possessed Skaab would die, exile it instead.

name: Reclusive Artificer
text: Haste. When Reclusive Artificer enters the battlefield, you may have it deal damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

name: Shaman of the Pack
text: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.

name: Thunderclap Wyvern
text: Flash. Flying. Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

name: Zendikar Incarnate
text: Zendikar Incarnate's power is equal to the number of lands you control.

name: Alchemist's Vial
text: When Alchemist's Vial enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

name: Alhammarret's Archive
text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead. If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

name: Angel's Tomb
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

name: Bonded Construct
text: Bonded Construct can't attack alone.

name: Brawler's Plate
text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Equip {4}

name: Chief of the Foundry
text: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
text: Flying

name: Guardian Automaton
text: When Guardian Automaton dies, you gain 3 life.

name: Guardian of Meletis
text: Defender

name: Hangarback Walker
text: Hangerback Walker enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Hangerback Walker dies, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each +1/+1 counter on Hangerback Walker. {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hangerback Walker.

name: Helm of the Gods
text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control. Equip {1}

name: Jayemdae Tome
text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.

name: Mage-Ring Responder
text: Mage-Ring Responder doesn't untap during your untap step. {7}: Untap Mage-Ring Responder. Whenever Mage-Ring Responder attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls.

name: Meteorite
text: When Meteorite enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Orbs of Warding
text: You have hexproof. If a creature would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Prism Ring
text: As Prism Ring enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, you gain 1 life.

name: Pyromancer's Goggles
text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Ramroller
text: Ramroller attacks each turn if able. Ramroller gets +2/+0 as long as you control another artifact.

name: Runed Servitor
text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

name: Sigil of Valor
text: Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets+1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control. Equip {1}

name: Sword of the Animist
text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Equip {2}.

name: Throwing Knife
text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may sacrifice Throwing Knife. If you do, Throwing Knife deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Equip {2}.

name: Veteran's Sidearm
text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1}.

name: War Horn
text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

name: Battlefield Forge
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

name: Caves of Koilos
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

name: Evolving Wilds
text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

name: Foundry of the Consuls
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Foundry of the Consuls: Put two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Llanowar Wastes
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

name: Mage-Ring Network
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Mage-Ring Network. {T}, Remove X storage counters from Mage-Ring Network: Add {X} to your mana pool.

name: Rogue's Passage
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

name: Shivan Reef
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

name: Yavimaya Coast
text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
